amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to reduce funding for the U.S. Institute of Peace to FY2019 enacted levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the U.S. Institute of Peace to FY2019 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 244 (Roll no. 299).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 244 (Roll no. 299).
